alerts.produceListed: Your produce has been listed successfully!
alerts.smsEnabledNoSelection: SMS alerts are enabled, but no specific notifications are selected.

auth.switchToRegister: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.switchToLogin: Already have an account? Log in
auth.errorEmailInUse: An account with this email already exists.
auth.errorPhoneInUse: An account with this phone number already exists.
auth.errorPasswordsDoNotMatch: The passwords you entered do not match.
auth.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordInstruction: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordConfirmation: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
auth.testOnPhoneDescription: Scan this QR code with your phone's camera to open SokoFresh in your mobile browser.

dashboard.title: Available Produce
dashboard.noListings: No produce listings match your filters.

marketPrices.title: Market Prices
marketPrices.noCountySelected: Please select one or more counties to view price data.

marketAssistant.title: Market Assistant
marketAssistant.initialMessage: Hello! I am your AI Market Assistant. Ask me anything about crop prices, pest control, or best planting times. You can also request a short instructional video by toggling the video icon.
marketAssistant.errorMessage: Sorry, I am having trouble connecting. Please try again later.

geolocation.error: Could not get your location. Answers may be less relevant.
geolocation.notSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.

video.inputPlaceholder: Describe the video you want to generate...
video.pleaseWait: This may take a few minutes. Please wait.
video.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

apiKey.title: API Key Required for Video Generation
apiKey.description: To generate videos, you need to select an API key. This is a premium feature and may incur costs.

gemini.systemInstruction: You are an expert agricultural advisor for smallholder farmers in Kenya. Your tone is helpful, encouraging, and easy to understand. Provide a concise, practical answer to the following question.
gemini.unavailableError: The AI Market Assistant is currently unavailable. Please ensure the API key is configured.
gemini.genericError: Sorry, I couldn't get advice at the moment. Please try again later.
gemini.apiKeyMissing: API Key is not configured for video generation.
gemini.videoGenerationFailed: Failed to generate video. The operation did not return a valid download link.

settings.title: Settings
settings.smsDescription: Opt-in to receive SMS notifications on your registered phone number. Standard message rates may apply.
settings.priceAlertsDescription: Select which crops you want to receive market price updates for.

messageModal.title: Message {{farmerName}}
messageModal.initialResponse: Hello! Thanks for your interest in the {{crop}}. How can I help you today?

cropDetails.title: Crop Information
cropDetails.noDetails: Detailed information for this crop is not yet available.
